Send-A-Job

Rilla is the virtual ridealong software for outside sales and service. 

Think sales people in solar, roofing, home remodeling, home services, CPG, Telco, medical, finance, retail, and the 12M+ sales people who sell offline. 

They talk to customers face to face. 

They record their conversations with our mobile app. 

And our AI automatically transcribes, analyzes and gives them feedback on all their conversations to help them improve their sales and service. 

Rilla helps outside sales managers save dozens of hours a month that they don't have to waste doing manual, physical ride alongs.

We have thousands of customers like Re-bath, Kohler, Groundworks and many of the top home improvement companies in the world.

If you want to go along for the adventure, we're hiring!
